comments.comment: Dear sister ; God is not the author of confusion, neither his word. from the beginning God created man and out of him he   created woman. Man should not be with a man or woman should not be with a woman neither have feelings , it‚Äôs an abomination to God , in other words it‚Äôs a sin before Gods eyes. It‚Äôs a twisted of identity. That being said ; you are a beautiful girl inside and out with beautiful talents. 2000 years ago a sinless man called ‚ÄúJesus‚Äù who suffered and died on the cross for our sins to redeem us from the bondage of sin, before he died he said, three strange words ‚Äú It is finished‚Äù that means death has been paid on the cross. Today you are free from the bondage of sin , put your complete trust in Jesus with all your heart, soul and might and he will help you over come your situation and replace your true identity back to you and will show you the perfect will of God. Love you and may God bless you.

comments.comment: Dear brothers & sisters....from my point of view, as a nation or an individual, we are truly underdeveloped. Whether we are gay/lesbian or straight, that is not the core issue. On top of all those things, true humanity is the thing with utmost importance. Even though some one gay or lesbian, he or she is a human being, they too have their own feeling.So we must respect them. We should not be blind folded further and every body should be treated alike.So may everybody should have the courage to stand on their feet & live in the society as same human being

replies.replyComment: Asha Ranatunga, everyone is entitled to his or her own opinion but not his own facts. I like the fact that someone like you could have an healthy opinion about this subject which I don't agree at all when someone is trying to market their race, sexual orientation, religion and etc, etc, to make their living. If you were a true talent you will get the opportunity no matter what no one can stop you but being an "ignorant Islander" please don't bring up the point that I was this and that? Your sexual orientation is something private to you and god sake enjoy it with some respect weather you're a lesbian, gay, bi or heterosexual. If Adam and Eve was a lesbian and gay you and me wouldn't have even been born yet until they would find a surrogate mother. Our society has to grow with mentally healthy population but in this "too liberal world" you can sleep with your best friend's wife and say sorry. And this is where "we today and our children tomorrow" will be heading and please do not promote this unless you hate your society.
